text: Avon was a county that existed from 1 April 1974 until 31 March 1996. It was in South West England. It was not popular, and was broken up between parts of Somerset, Bristol and Gloucestershire. Category:1974 establishments in England Category:1996 disestablishments in England Category:Historic counties of England Category:South West England https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/1/17/Greater_bristol_with_everything.png
